description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物、马来民族统一机构党员，为马来西亚第五任首相（2003－2009）。官方授予其头衔为“人力资源发展之父”。
description.en: A Malaysian politician and member of the United Malays National Organisation (UMNO), who served as the fifth Prime Minister of Malaysia from 2003 to 2009. He was officially given the title 'Father of Human Capital Development'.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第四及第七任首相，在1987年巫统党选中与阿都拉·阿末·巴达威所在的B队抗衡，后委任阿都拉为副手并最终将首相职位交接给他。
description.en: The fourth and seventh Prime Minister of Malaysia. He competed against Abdullah Ahmad Badawi's 'Team B' in the 1987 UMNO party election, later appointed Abdullah as his deputy, and eventually handed over the premiership to him.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第六任首相。他曾是阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的副手，并于2009年接替其首相职位。
description.en: The sixth Prime Minister of Malaysia. He served as Abdullah Ahmad Badawi's deputy and succeeded him as Prime Minister in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物。其副首相职位由阿都拉·阿末·巴达威接替。
description.en: A Malaysian politician. His position as Deputy Prime Minister was succeeded by Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的主要政党之一。阿都拉·阿末·巴达威曾长期担任其党员、副主席及主席。2008年大选后，党内的压力迫使阿都拉提早卸任首相。
description.en: A major political party in Malaysia. Abdullah Ahmad Badawi was a long-serving member, Vice President, and President. After the 2008 general election, pressure from within the party forced Abdullah to step down early as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十二届大选。在此次选举中，由阿都拉·阿末·巴达威领导的国民阵线首次失去三分之二的国会绝对多数议席，导致他面临党内压力并提早卸任。
description.en: The 12th Malaysian general election. In this election, the Barisan Nasional coalition led by Abdullah Ahmad Badawi lost its two-thirds supermajority in parliament for the first time, leading to internal party pressure and his early resignation.

description.zh-cn: 在此次选举中，由阿都拉·阿末·巴达威领导的国民阵线取得了压倒性胜利，赢得了90%的国会议席。
description.en: In this election, the Barisan Nasional coalition led by Abdullah Ahmad Badawi won a landslide victory, securing 90% of the parliamentary seats.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的一个主要政治联盟。在阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的领导下，该联盟在2004年大选中大胜，但在2008年大选中遭遇重挫。
description.en: A major political coalition in Malaysia. Under the leadership of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi, the coalition achieved a major victory in the 2004 general election but suffered a significant setback in the 2008 general election.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的女婿。
description.en: A Malaysian politician and the son-in-law of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威与恩顿·玛末的女儿，凯里·嘉马鲁丁的妻子。
description.en: The daughter of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi and Endon Mahmood, and the wife of Khairy Jamaluddin.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 位于马来西亚吉隆坡的公立研究型大学，是阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的母校。
description.en: A public research university in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and the alma mater of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物。在1987年巫统党选中，他与慕沙希淡、阿都拉·阿末·巴达威同属B队，与马哈迪的A队抗衡。
description.en: A Malaysian politician. In the 1987 UMNO party election, he, along with Musa Hitam and Abdullah Ahmad Badawi, was part of 'Team B', which challenged Mahathir's 'Team A'.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政治人物。在1987年巫统党选中，他与东姑拉沙里、阿都拉·阿末·巴达威同属B队，与马哈迪的A队抗衡。
description.en: A Malaysian politician. In the 1987 UMNO party election, he, along with Tengku Razaleigh Hamzah and Abdullah Ahmad Badawi, was part of 'Team B', which challenged Mahathir's 'Team A'.

description.zh-cn: 1987年的马来民族统一机构党内选举。阿都拉·阿末·巴达威在此次选举中参与了挑战时任主席马哈迪的B队，虽成功保住副主席职位，但其部长职位随后被撤除。
description.en: The 1987 United Malays National Organisation party election. Abdullah Ahmad Badawi participated in 'Team B' which challenged the incumbent president Mahathir. Although he successfully defended his vice-president post, his ministerial position was subsequently revoked.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十二任最高元首。阿都拉·阿末·巴达威在其任期内担任首相。
description.en: The 12th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia. Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as Prime Minister during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚第十三任最高元首。阿都拉·阿末·巴达威在其任期内担任首相，并由他授予“敦”头衔。
description.en: The 13th Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia. Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as Prime Minister during his reign and was conferred the title of 'Tun' by him.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚伊斯兰党主席，曾评价阿都拉·阿末·巴达威为“弱势首相”。
description.en: President of the Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS), who once described Abdullah Ahmad Badawi as a 'weak Prime Minister'.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚干净及公正选举联盟。该组织在2007年成功号召万人大集会，导致时任首相阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的支持率跌至历史新低。
description.en: The Coalition for Clean and Fair Elections in Malaysia. The organization successfully mobilized a mass rally in 2007, which led to a record-low approval rating for then-Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚兴都权益行动委员会。该组织在2007年成功号召万人大集会，导致时任首相阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的支持率跌至历史新低。
description.en: The Hindu Rights Action Force in Malaysia. The organization successfully mobilized a mass rally in 2007, which led to a record-low approval rating for then-Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government position in Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 马来西亚政府的第二高职位。
description.en: The second-highest position in the government of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威于1964年从马来亚大学获得伊斯兰研究的学士学位。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi graduated from the University of Malaya in 1964 with a bachelor's degree in Islamic Studies.

description.zh-cn: 恩顿·玛末是阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的第一任妻子。
description.en: Endon Mahmood was the first wife of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 珍阿都拉是阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的第二任妻子。
description.en: Jeanne Abdullah was the second wife of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 凯里·嘉马鲁丁是阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的女婿。
description.en: Khairy Jamaluddin is the son-in-law of Abdullah Ahmad Badawi.

description.zh-cn: 时任首相马哈迪·莫哈末委任阿都拉·阿末·巴达威担任副首相。
description.en: Then-Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad appointed Abdullah Ahmad Badawi as Deputy Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 在马哈迪·莫哈末担任首相期间，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威担任副首相。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as Deputy Prime Minister during Mahathir Mohamad's premiership.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威从马哈迪·莫哈末手中接任，成为马来西亚第五任首相。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi took over from Mahathir Mohamad to become the fifth Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威接替安华·伊布拉欣，担任马来西亚第八任副首相。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi succeeded Anwar Ibrahim as the eighth Deputy Prime Minister of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威于2009年4月3日将首相职位交接给其副手纳吉·阿都拉萨。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi handed over the premiership to his deputy, Najib Razak, on April 3, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 在阿都拉·阿末·巴达威担任首相期间，纳吉·阿都拉萨担任其副手。
description.en: During Abdullah Ahmad Badawi's premiership, Najib Razak served as his deputy.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威领导的国民阵线在2004年大选中取得压倒性胜利，巩固了其首相地位。
description.en: The Barisan Nasional coalition led by Abdullah Ahmad Badawi won a landslide victory in the 2004 general election, consolidating his position as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 国民阵线在2008年大选中首次失去国会三分之二多数优势，导致阿都拉·阿末·巴达威面临巫统内部压力，并提早卸任。
description.en: In the 2008 general election, the Barisan Nasional lost its two-thirds parliamentary supermajority for the first time, leading to Abdullah Ahmad Badawi facing internal pressure from UMNO and resigning early.

description.zh-cn: 2008年大选后，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威面对来自巫统内部的长期施压逼宫，最终于2009年4月宣布卸任。
description.en: After the 2008 general election, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi faced long-term pressure from within UMNO to step down, eventually announcing his resignation in April 2009.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威曾担任巫统主席（2003-2009）、署理主席（1999-2003）及副主席。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as President of UMNO (2003-2009), Deputy President (1999-2003), and Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 阿都拉·阿末·巴达威参与挑战马哈迪的B队，虽成功保住副主席职位，但其国防部长职位随后被撤除。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi joined 'Team B' to challenge Mahathir, and although he retained his Vice President post, his position as Minister of Defence was subsequently revoked.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年巫统党选中，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威因与马哈迪对立，其国防部长职位被撤除。
description.en: After the 1987 UMNO party election, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi's position as Minister of Defence was revoked due to his opposition to Mahathir.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年巫统党选中，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威与东姑拉沙里同属B队，共同挑战马哈迪。
description.en: In the 1987 UMNO party election, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi was allied with Tengku Razaleigh Hamzah in 'Team B' to challenge Mahathir.

description.zh-cn: 在1987年巫统党选中，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威与慕沙希淡同属B队，共同挑战马哈迪。
description.en: In the 1987 UMNO party election, Abdullah Ahmad Badawi was allied with Musa Hitam in 'Team B' to challenge Mahathir.

description.zh-cn: 在端姑赛西拉祖丁担任马来西亚最高元首期间，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威担任首相。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as Prime Minister during the reign of Tuanku Syed Sirajuddin as the Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 在端姑米占·再纳·阿比丁担任马来西亚最高元首期间，阿都拉·阿末·巴达威担任首相。
description.en: Abdullah Ahmad Badawi served as Prime Minister during the reign of Tuanku Mizan Zainal Abidin as the Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia.

description.zh-cn: 净选盟在2007年成功号召万人大集会，导致时任首相阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的支持率在2007年第四季度跌至历史新低61%。
description.en: Bersih successfully organized a mass rally in 2007, which caused the approval rating of then-Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi to drop to a historic low of 61% in the fourth quarter of 2007.

description.zh-cn: 兴权会在2007年成功号召万人大集会，导致时任首相阿都拉·阿末·巴达威的支持率在2007年第四季度跌至历史新低61%。
description.en: HINDRAF successfully organized a mass rally in 2007, which caused the approval rating of then-Prime Minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi to drop to a historic low of 61% in the fourth quarter of 2007.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰党主席哈迪阿旺评价阿都拉·阿末·巴达威是一名“弱势首相”。
description.en: PAS President Abdul Hadi Awang described Abdullah Ahmad Badawi as a 'weak Prime Minister'.
